patterns.name: Doodle stitch
rows: Switch to US 4/3.5 mm dpns or magic loop
when needed to accommodate smaller crown
circumference.
Row 1: P to last 2 sts. P2tog. 104 sts.
Row 2, 4, 6, and 8: P to end
Row 3: [P2, P2tog]. Repeat bracketed sts to end. 78 sts.
Row 5: [P1, P2tog]. Repeat bracketed sts to end. 52 sts.
Row 7: P2tog to end. 26 sts.
Row 9: P2 tog to end. 13 sts.
